the dragon and phoenix are symbols of good fortune (idiom)/auspicious/decorated with auspicious symbols such as the dragon and the phoenix
Longfeng district of Daqing city 大慶|大庆[Da4 qing4], Heilongjiang

sentences.english: Jiao body red drapery Cui lid, up put Long Feng to show lucky omen, four the angles hang silk Sui.
sentences.chinese: 轿身红幔翠盖，上面插龙凤呈祥，四角挂着丝穗。

sentences.english: You could say that she's my female half because we're fraternal twins.
sentences.chinese: 你可以说你是我的半个女人，因为我们是龙凤胎。

sentences.english: Hepburn adjusts her makeup on the set of "Sabrina" 1954.
sentences.chinese: 拍摄于1954年，赫本在拍摄《龙凤配》时补妆。

sentences.english: Harrison Ford stars in the remake of "Sabrina".
sentences.chinese: 哈里森福特在“新龙凤配”这部电影中担纲演出。

sentences.english: The 'Dragon and Phoenix' worked in perfect harmony.
sentences.chinese: “龙凤配”的合作是完美的和谐。

sentences.english: It is this year's first mixed-sex panda twins born at the base. (See photo)
sentences.chinese: 这是今年该中心第一对熊猫龙凤胎。

sentences.english: Olympic refueling for the Chinese jade acclaimed debut Need for the glass to wear.
sentences.chinese: 为奥运加油，为中国玉喝彩，极品玻璃地龙凤佩亮相。

sentences.english: Hepburn adjusts her makeup on the set of "Sabrina, " 1954.
sentences.chinese: 拍摄于1954年，赫本在拍摄《龙凤配》时补妆。

sentences.english: Same-sex twins were, on average, nearly one inch taller than their opposite-sex counterparts.
sentences.chinese: 同性双胞胎比龙凤胎平均高出将近一英寸。

sentences.english: The story revolves around a pair of twins, siblings started.
sentences.chinese: 故事围绕着一对龙凤胎姐弟俩开始了。

sentences.english: On a platform you will see bronze dragons, phoenixes and tripods.
sentences.chinese: 你会看到在一个平台，龙凤青铜龙和三脚。

sentences.english: A woman with a twin brother is more masculine than she would if she was born alone.
sentences.chinese: 龙凤胎出生的女士会比单独出生更具有男性特点。

sentences.english: If you want to be a virtuous and talented person, you have to redouble your efforts.
sentences.chinese: 要想成为人中龙凤，就要付出多倍的努力。

sentences.english: Dragon-phoenix bangles are classical marriage jewelry and are a necessary part of a Chinese wedding.
sentences.chinese: 其中龙凤手镯是经典且必不可少的中式婚礼珠宝配饰。

sentences.english: A mother holding a pair of arms is still in its infancy in the Longfeng twins.
sentences.chinese: 一位母亲怀里抱着一对尚在襁褓中的龙凤双胞胎。

sentences.english: Dragon and Phoenix Ski Resort fees are relatively low.
sentences.chinese: 龙凤山滑雪场的收费相对是比较低的。

definition: the dragon and phoenix are symbols of good fortune (idiom)/auspicious/decorated with auspicious symbols such as the dragon and the phoenix

Panlong district of Kunming city 昆明市[Kun1 ming2 shi4], Yunnan
luan and phoenix/husband and wife/virtuous person/sovereign/belle

four divinities/four divine emperors/four mythical creatures symbolic of prosperity and longevity, namely the phoenix 鳳|凤[feng4], turtle 龜|龟[gui1], dragon 龍|龙[long2] and Chinese unicorn 麒麟[qi2 lin2]/also 四象[si4 xiang4], the four division of the sky
five (main) colors (white, black, red, yellow, and blue)/multicolored
variant of 鎦金|镏金[liu2 jin1]
